channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Radio Nikki: Haley launching a weekly SiriusXM radio talk show at least through January
item.description: Nikki Haley says sheâ€™s launching a weekly talk show on SiriusXM satellite radio starting next week. The last Republican opponent of Donald Trump who was left standing in the GOP nomination fight will interview guests, take calls, and talk policy and maybe a little Clemson football on her show.

item.title: A key employee who called the Titan unsafe will testify before the Coast Guard
item.description: David Lochridge is one of the most anticipated witnesses to appear before a commission trying to determine what caused the Titan to implode.

item.title: Not-so-great expectations: Students are reading fewer books in English class
item.description: In many English classrooms across America, assignments to read full-length novels are becoming less common.
